Hi Destiny,

 

Thank you for writing to us. We acknowledge receipt of your email. We have below pending condition for CTC:

 

1) 2002 --  Provide below information with respect to the escrow/attorney company and escrow officer / attorney's contact for loan related correspondence:

1.Name, address, phone number and State License ID of the escrow/attorney company.
2.Name, phone number, email ID and State License ID of the escrow officer / attorney's contact.
3.Escrow Number
4.Email address for delivery of final loans docs

 

2) CR03 --   LOE is in editable format. Please provide it in non editable format.


  Please provide signed and dated Letter of Explanation (LOE) from Borrower William Baynum for the below mentioned credit inquiry/inquiries reported on
  the credit report / soft pull / LQI report.
 
  1. Barrett Financial GR on 9/28/2020, 8/24/2020
  2. Credit Fax Cisco INC on 8/24/2020, 9/28/2020
 
  Note : If any of the above inquiries resulted in a new account opened (or a  new debt/liability) then provide the most recent account statement or letter
  from the creditor to confirm the monthly payment and current account balance.
  Monthly payments of such accounts will be included in the debt ratio  calculation or expense analysis. Additional conditions may apply upon review.

 

3) VD01 --  Provide additional assets document to meet cash to close.

 
 Total funds to be verified is $18,352.36. See below breakdown:
 
 Cash to close: $16,097.36 (MRI)
 Reserve Required: $2,255(30-Day Charge Account)
   
 Available assets: $16,929.49. See below breakdown:
 
 1. Columbia Bank, Account #1133, Balance $15,000.10
 2. Columbia Bank, Account #6923, Balance $1,929.29
 
 Borrower is short for closing. Provide bank statements covering most recent 1 month per agency guidelines for additional funds needed. If an online statement or transaction history is provided as documentation for sufficient funds then the document should have a valid URL (right click and print- not a screen shot) or bank stamp. Cash to close is subject to change.
   
   Note: If Verification of Deposit (VOD) is used for documenting funds to close, one month bank statement is required. Average account balance on VOD must support current balance. Any large deposit must be sourced.

Please note that the following conditions have been escalated to the Underwriter to be reviewed / resolved :

1) A00C -- Revised Appraisal Report.

2) CE00 -- Documentation to be provided for the STUDENT/UNEMPLOYED.

3) VE2R -- Verification of Employment (VOE) is required from the employer of the borrower.

4) BS01 -- Complete bank statement showing sufficient assets to cover cash to close / reserves.

5) CD06 -- Complete paper trail for all Large deposits noted on Bank statements.

6) CE19 -- Explanation of the Employment gaps

7) CR01 -- Acceptable Credit Supplement with corrections requested

8) DSRM -- New Credit Report required showing Dispute resolved.

9) FD06 -- Satisfactory evidence of Hazard Insurance for subject property.

10) LF56 -- Sr. UW to obtain/review Tax certificate.

11) PRLM -- Preliminary Title report or Title Commitment report is required for review by Sr. UW..

12) VEVR -- SWMC to complete Re-verification of VOE.

 

Once these PTD conditions (i.e. prior to docs conditions) are cleared we can check the file for CTC.

Please let us know if you have any other questions or concerns with regards to this file.

Subject: Re: 120307025500 BAYNUM, WILLIAM: Appraisal report has been received

 

The below conditions are still open:


CE00 - Documentation to be provided for the STUDENT/UNEMPLOYED

Borrower declared in 1003, that borrower shows Student/unemployed for the period 07/31/2019 to 04/01/2020. Please confirm if borrower was unemployed in the said period, if yes then we require LOE from the borrower stating the reason for the unemployment If borrower was student in the said period then provide student transcripts to verify the dates.[^]

8 Days

VE2R - Verification of Employment (VOE) is required from employer of the borrower

Document received under this condition doesn't suffice the condition requirement as it doesn't provide any information for employer Lowe's. Provide Verification of Employment for William Baynum from employer Lowe's to check the borrower's two years employment history. 1. Employer to provide start and end date of employment. Note: Work No VOE available for borrower Willian Baynum does not provide termination date with employer Lowe's. 1. Provide Verification of Employment electronically completed by third party vendor such as Work Number VOE; OR 2. Provide Written Verification of Employment (1005) from employer and as a Pre-funding requirement, SWMC will re-verify the data provided on the written VOE; OR 3. If SWMC is able to obtain the VOE directly from the employer then no action is required from client.[^]

8 Days

FD08 - Deliverable Mailing Address as per USPS

The subject property address '430 Twilight Way, Grapeview, Wa 98546' is non deliverable per USPS. Provide us with an alternate mailing address for correspondence which is verifiable by USPS[^]

8 Days

PRLM - Preliminary Title report or Title Commitment report is required for review by Sr. UW.

Following documents are required: 1. Preliminary Title report or Title Commitment report is required, which needs to be reviewed by Sr. UW in order to validate following requirements: Chain of Title Good and Marketable Title Requests for Title Exceptions Not Covered by the General Waiver If subject property is Manufactured Housing then it must be classified as real estate Legal Restrictions on Conveyance Verifying the Judgments or Liens against subject property 2. Wire Instructions (Not Applicable on C** loans) 3. E & O Policy from Closing Agent (Not Applicable on C** loans except state of NY or United States Virgin Island) Note: Address of Closing Agent on CPL, Wire Instructions and the E & O must bear the same name and location of closing agent.[^]

8 Days

TI34 - Closing Protection Letter

Title to provide a copy of the Closing Protection Letter. **CPL to show title order number, borrower name, complete property address and state specific loss payee with the "It's Successors and/or Assigns" clause. Also address of closing agent on CPL, wire instructions and the E & O must bear the same name and location of closing agent** (Note: In cases wherein the CPL has the following provision then we can accept the CPL without "It's Successors and/or Assigns" clause "If you are a lender protected by this letter, your borrower, your assignee and your warehouse lender in connection with an Insured Mortgage shall be protected as if it was addressed to them". However, if this provision is not present on the CPL, then the CPL should include "It's Successors and/or Assigns" after the insured company's name. Note: ISAOA in loss payee clause instead of "Its Successors and/or Assigns" is acceptable.) SWMC RM must verify that the CPL is not older than 30 days from the date it was issued unless the CPL mentions a particular expiry date or have specific instructions stating that the document is valid for a certain period (more than 30 days).[^]

8 Days

RH07 - FHA Amendatory and Real Estate Certificate

FHA Amendatory and Real Estate Certificate to be signed and dated by all parties.[^]

8 Days

WACL - Title Insurance License for Escrow Company, Title Company and Closing Agent for WA State

The title insurance license is required for escrow company, title company and closing agent for WA state as settlement service providers must be licensed with WA department of financial institutions.[^]

8 Days

DSRM - New Credit Report required showing Dispute resolved

Borrower William Bynum's credit report reflects following disputed derogatory accounts: 1. 2013 Bankruptcy in Dispute As per agency guideline, if the credit report utilized by TOTAL Mortgage Scorecard (DU) has disputed derogatory accounts with balance $1000 or more, loan can not be approved as DU approved loan. Provide new credit report with dispute resolved for above referenced accounts. Additional conditions may apply after the review of new credit report.[^]

8 Days

VD01 - Complete bank statement / Asset documents showing sufficient funds to cover cash to close / reserves

Total funds to be verified is $13,170.73. See below breakdown: 1. Cash to close: $13,170.73 Borrower is short by $13,170.73 for closing. Provide bank statements covering most recent one month for additional funds needed. If an online statement or transaction history is provided as documentation for sufficient funds then the document should have valid URL (right click and print- not a screen shot) or bank stamp. Cash to close is subject to change. Note: If Verification of Deposit (VOD) is used for documenting funds to close, one month bank statement is required. Average account balance on VOD must support current balance. Any large deposit must be sourced.[^]
